edge: Girish Kumar portrays the character of Ram Kapoor in this movie.
Randhir Kapoor plays the role of Siddhanth Kapoor, Ram's father in the movie.
Poonam Dhillon essays the character of Ashwini Kapoor, Ram's mother in the movie.
In this movie, Girish Kumar and Sonu Sood appear as Ram Kapoor and Raghuveer 'Raghu' Singh, respectively. It is also mentioned that Raghu is Sona's elder brother.
Jiya Khan depicts the character of Little Sona in this movie.
Shruti Haasan is seen as Sona Singh in this movie.
Paresh Ganatra enacts the role of Bijlee in this movie.
In this movie, Satish Shah portrays Krishna Kant Bhargav, Ram's maternal uncle.
Nassar plays the character of Jay Prakash (J.P.), Krishna Kant's business partner in this movie.
Govind Namdev appears as Zamindar Lala in this movie.
In this movie, Sarfaraz Khan depicts the character of Ajay, Lala’s son.
Zakir Hussain portrays the role of Rao in this movie.
Anchal Singh appears as Ram's cousin and Sona's best friend, Ria Bhargav in this movie.
Anshul Trivedi enacts the character of Anshul, Ria’s husband in this movie.
In this movie, Kenisha Awasthi portrays the character of Dolly Prakash, J.P.'s daughter.
In this movie, Aarti Puri appears as Gauri.
Shiraz Ahmed enacts the role of Jailor in this movie.
In this movie, Harry Josh appears as Afzal.
In this movie, Juhi Chawla plays the character of Vasudha.
Vivek Oberoi appears as Rahul in this movie.
